title: Understanding Risk Factors
text: Consider the emotional and social aspects that might contribute to an increased risk of suicide.

title: Emotional Instability
text: Think about how emotional instability can affect a person's mental health and decision-making.

title: Social Isolation
text: Reflect on how being socially isolated might impact someone's mental health and increase suicide risk.

hintAnswer: feelings of hopelessness, social isolation, poor adherence to treatment, high levels of impulsivity and aggression, and previous suicide attempts
title: Identifying Key Factors
text: Which of the following are considered key factors that heighten the risk of suicide?
choices: increased emotional instability, impulsivity, and verbal expressions of hopelessness or overwhelming stress
feelings of hopelessness, social isolation, poor adherence to treatment, high levels of impulsivity and aggression, and previous suicide attempts
